text: Veronika Buzhinskaya () was a Soviet film actress. == Selected filmography == * 1922 — Dolya ty russkaya, dolyushka zhenskaya * 1926 — Katka's Reinette Apples * 1927 — The Decembrists (film) * 1928 — The Parisian Cobbler * 1963 — An Optimistic Tragedy ==References== == External links == * Вероника Бужинская on kino-teatr.ru * Category:Soviet film actresses Category:1895 births Category:1983 deaths
title: Veronika Buzhinskaya
